name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-web-parts-react-members-with-presence
title: Group members list with Presence information
shortDescription: This sample shows how to get the members of a specific group, including their presence information (using the new Presence endpoint in the MS Graph API).
longDescription: This sample shows how to get the members of a specific group, including their presence information (using the new Presence endpoint in the MS Graph API).

thumbnails.alt: Group members list with Presence information

references.name: Build your first SharePoint client-side web part
references.description: Client-side web parts are client-side components that run in the context of a SharePoint page. Client-side web parts can be deployed to SharePoint environments that support the SharePoint Framework. You can also use modern JavaScript web frameworks, tools, and libraries to build them.
